survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Electric Scooter Sharing Services
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of electric scooter sharing services to understand their satisfaction levels and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question. Ensure options are clear and cover all usage frequencies.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use electric scooter sharing services?

questions.question_text: What factors influence your choice of electric scooter sharing service? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox for this question. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE with an optional open-text field for 'Other'

script.question_text: What factors influence your choice of electric scooter sharing service? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the ease of locating and unlocking scooters?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for this question. Ensure the scale is balanced and clearly labeled.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the ease of locating and unlocking scooters?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field for this question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the field is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for electric scooter sharing services?

questions.question_text: Have you experienced any safety issues while using electric scooter sharing services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question. If 'Yes' is selected, follow up with Q6.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with conditional routing to Q6 if 'Yes' is selected

script.question_text: Have you experienced any safety issues while using electric scooter sharing services?

questions.question_text: Please describe the safety issue you encountered.
questions.routing_logic: Appears only if Q5 is answered with 'Yes'
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field for this question to gather detailed feedback on safety issues. Ensure the field is large enough for detailed responses.

script.question_text: Please describe the safety issue you encountered.
script.routing_logic: Appears only if Q5 is answered with 'Yes'
